rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever another creature or planeswalker dies, create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{B}{B}, Sacrifice two Blood tokens: Return Morbius from your graveyard to the battlefield. He can't block this turn. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
